mapper.insert: insert into material_info (id, create_user_id, canvas_info_id_private, canvas_info_id_public, material_name, material_description, material_type, material_url, thumbnail_url, png_url, upload_time, color_type, color_percentage, is_valid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{canvasInfoIdPrivate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{canvasInfoIdPublic,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{materialUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{thumbnailUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{colorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colorPercentage,jdbcType=REAL}, #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update material_info
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
canvas_info_id_private = #{canvasInfoIdPrivate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
canvas_info_id_public = #{canvasInfoIdPublic,jdbcType=BIGINT},
material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_description = #{materialDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_url = #{materialUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thumbnail_url = #{thumbnailUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
png_url = #{pngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
color_type = #{colorType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
color_percentage = #{colorPercentage,jdbcType=REAL},
is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update material_info set create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, canvas_info_id_private = #{canvasInfoIdPrivate,jdbcType=BIGINT}, canvas_info_id_public = #{canvasInfoIdPublic,jdbcType=BIGINT}, material_name = #{materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_description = #{materialDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_type = #{materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, material_url = #{materialUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumbnail_url = #{thumbnailUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, png_url = #{pngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, upload_time = #{uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, color_type = #{colorType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, color_percentage = #{colorPercentage,jdbcType=REAL}, is_valid = #{isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update material_info
create_user_id = #{materialInfoDomain.createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
canvas_info_id_private = #{materialInfoDomain.canvasInfoIdPrivate,jdbcType=BIGINT},
canvas_info_id_public = #{materialInfoDomain.canvasInfoIdPublic,jdbcType=BIGINT},
material_name = #{materialInfoDomain.materialName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_description = #{materialInfoDomain.materialDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_type = #{materialInfoDomain.materialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
material_url = #{materialInfoDomain.materialUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
thumbnail_url = #{materialInfoDomain.thumbnailUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
png_url = #{materialInfoDomain.pngUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
upload_time = #{materialInfoDomain.uploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
color_type = #{materialInfoDomain.colorType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
color_percentage = #{materialInfoDomain.colorPercentage,jdbcType=REAL},
is_valid = #{materialInfoDomain.isValid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where canvas_info_id_private = #{canvasId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and create_user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.create_user_id, a.canvas_info_id_private, a.canvas_info_id_public, a.material_name, a.material_description, a.material_type, a.material_url, a.thumbnail_url, a.png_url, a.upload_time, a.color_type, a.color_percentage, a.is_valid, b.material_type_code_parent, b.material_type_code_child, b.material_style_code, (case when c.count_download is null then 0 else c.count_download end) as count_download from material_info as a left join material_type_info as b on a.id=b.materail_info_id left join ( select c.material_info_id, count(c.id) as count_download from material_history_collection as c GROUP BY c.material_info_id) as c on a.id=c.material_info_id where a.is_valid = 1
select id from material_info where material_url = #{materialUrl}

select a.id as materialInfoId, a.thumbnail_url as thumbnailUrl from material_info as a, material_type_info as b where a.id = b.materail_info_id and b.material_type_code_parent = '01'
and a.thumbnail_url in
#{listItem}
and a.thumbnail_url in ('')
select count(id) from material_info where canvas_info_id_private = #{canvasId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and is_valid = 1

from material_info where
id in

id in ('')
mapper.delete:
delete from material_info where

id in ('')
mapper.select: select a.id, a.create_user_id, a.canvas_info_id_private, a.canvas_info_id_public, a.material_name, a.material_description, a.material_type, a.material_url, a.thumbnail_url, a.png_url, a.upload_time, a.color_type, a.color_percentage, a.is_valid, b.canvas_name, b.describe_info, c.id, c.materail_info_id, c.material_type_code_parent, c.material_type_code_child, c.material_style_code, c.create_time from material_info as a LEFT JOIN canvas_info as b on a.canvas_info_id_private = b.id LEFT JOIN (select c.id,c.materail_info_id,c.material_type_code_parent, c.material_type_code_child,c.material_style_code,c.create_time from material_type_info as c) as c on c.materail_info_id = a.id where a.id = #{materialId} AND a.is_valid = 1
